name: Vuetify for Figma - Community
description:
The most complete Design System for Figma!

You never used a component library as big and organized as this one.

Vuetify is a well know Vue UI Library, and now you have all of its components ready to use in Figma! 

Vuetify for Figma is a complete toolkit for Designers, powered by an awesome framework for Developers.


This product includes:

  • Countless components: Yes, that's right, we couldn't count, sorry. But every single component from Vuetify is available, along with every Icon from Material Icons and all its variations.
  • Auto-Layout Ready: Responsiveness is very important for any design. And that’s why we use Auto-Layout in almost all components!
  • Figma Variants: All components are designed using Figma’s Variants feature, making your design a lot faster and easier to create


Download complete version at www.vuetifyforfigma.com

---------------------------

Created by Infinity Tools

Powered by Vuetify
